posts.content:
stolen from basildon, essex.
it went yesterday night / early morning.
the dude was working on it till 8 in the evening and then came out in the morning and its gone.

BAY WINDOW
WHITE OVER BRIGHT (LIME) GREEN
AUTOMATIC
REG; TLL627R

probably long gone now but keeps your eyes peeled if you would .
Steeling bays now what makes me ill is it will probably be somebody linked to the scene anyway eyes peeled up north

I'll keep a look out down here, do you have a pic? I would probs remember better that way.

Lee

W**kers.

Will keep our eyes open, and get the kids to shout out.

This was probably recoverd as it's been taxed again!
